description:
In today's world, the brand is a very important and sensitive part of a business. In this course, you will learn what is a brand, what are the benefits, how to choose a right name and a right logo for you company. You will learn too how to use your brand on social media networks and how to make your own business cards, flyers and so on.

So, why to take this course? Well, if you have a business or if you want to start one, you can sell more products/services so you can make more money just by branding your business.
title: Brand Your Business
